mapper.select: SELECT `no`, `id`, `name`, `password`, `nickname`, `money`, `win`, `lose`, `email`, `character`, `admin` FROM player WHERE id=#{id} AND password=#{password}
SELECT id FROM player WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{email};
SELECT no FROM player WHERE id=#{id} AND email=#{email};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO player( `name`, `id`, password, nickname, email, `character`) VALUES( #{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{character} )
mapper.select: SELECT no,id,nickname,money,win,lose,`character`,money as rank FROM player ORDER BY money desc LIMIT 0,100
SELECT no,id,nickname,money,win,lose,`character`,win+lose as rank FROM player ORDER BY 8 desc LIMIT 0,100
SELECT no,id,nickname,money,win,lose,`character`,round((win/(win+lose))*100,1) as rank FROM player WHERE win+lose > 40 ORDER BY 8 desc LIMIT 0,100
